metadata.title: CVE-2018-14774 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in HttpKernel in Symfony 2.7.0 through 2.7.48,2.8.0 through 2.8.43, 3.3.0 through 3.3.17, 3.4.0 through 3.4.13, 4.0.0through 4.0.13, and 4.1.0 through 4.1.2. When using HttpCache, the valuesof the X-Forwarded-Host headers are implicitly set as trusted while thisshould be forbidden, leading to potential host header injection.

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
